name: sky9292
short_description:
◦ C++ network library using ACE. When someone use this library, theycan make high performance network application easily. It will teach howto use ACE framework correctly. There are 2 networkmodels.Proactor(IOCP) and Reactor(WaitForMultipleObjects). Both of twocan attach connector and acceptor. Proactor could make greatperformance in windows. Now it only supports windows.

Itincludes packet generator using python. When someone use this packetgenerator, they can generate variety protocols easily. It is similar to Google protocol buffers. I adopt YAML format as a protocol definition file
Support environment
OS : Windows XP, Windows 2003 Server
IDE : vc8, vc9
ACE version : 5.5, 5.6
python version : 2.5, 2.6
summary: C++ network library  Implementation of  It includes packet generator
